content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: LBSTRESU
      operator: non_empty
    - name:
      operator:
      value:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0190
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if LBSTRESU is not null and LBSTNRC is not expressed using
  the units in LBSTRESU
Outcome:
  Message: LBSTNRC is not expressed using the units in LBSTRESU when LBSTRESU is populated.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0190
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Reference Range for Char Rslt-Std Units
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 6.3.5.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - LB

json.Description: Trigger error if LBSTRESU is not null and LBSTNRC is not expressed using the units in LBSTRESU

Outcome.Message: LBSTNRC is not expressed using the units in LBSTRESU when LBSTRESU is populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Reference Range for Char Rslt-Std Units
